title: Statue Base with Feet of Kneeling Worshipper
period: Saite Period or First Persian Period
description:
Grey-green schist statue base with part of feet of kneeling worshipper, now missing. Two lines of text on top of front of base, one line round base, and end of two columns on back pillar remains. Base is rounded in front and rather high for its size. Owner: Pf-t;w-'-nj.t, son of W;w;-wr(m.) and of T;s-sp-pr.t- (fem.).

Condition: Fragment; much chipped and damaged. Only traces of knees and lower legs preserved.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
